text:
Pengalaman yg unik bisa menginap di Korurua Ubud. Hotel dengan konsep Bali jadul dengan suasana alam di sekitarnya .
Lingkungan hotel yg benar” tenang dan asri sehingga membuat kita semakin betah. Kalian akan di suguhkan suasana seperti jaman dulu yg benar asri di pedesaan.  Cocok buat mereka yang suka suasana pedesaaan dengan layout / kontur hotel yang turun dan naik. 

Bentuk villa yg mengadopsi dari rumah jaman dulu tapi di upgrade sedemikian rupa sehingga membuat tamu betah dan tempat tidur yang nyaman saat menginap.  Service yg baik dan staff juga ramah. Dan jangan lupa juga untuk singgah di Umatiki restaurant. Breakfast nya terbaik dengan fresh fruit dan aneka macam menu
title: Best combination

text:
We stayed 5 nights in Korurua Villa at the start of our holiday. It was a great choice - the villa is very new, clean and well kept in a jungle-like setting. Bed super comfortable. The villa is also very quiet - it felt like we had a private pool, as whenever we used the pool we had it to ourselves! 

The staff were very friendly and helpful and room service was excellent. Lots of small details made this stay special: the towel art, extra adapter provided in the room, insect repellent, room service organising our cables etc.  Breakfast was very good too, and we were able to preorder breakfast on days where we wanted to leave the villa early.

In terms of location the villa is well located just 5 mins drive from the centre of Ubud. A free shuttle service is provided. There are also a couple of nice restaurants within a 5 min walk from the villa.
We found Ubud generally to be a great base for exploring Bali.
title: Beautiful villa in Ubud. Exceeded expectations!

text:
We had an amazing time at Korurua. From the check in late at night til the morning of check out the staff has been exceptionally welcoming and accommodating to every need. As the villa has 7 rooms, they really get to know you by name, and get to know your preferences such as food likes and dislikes, for example. Food was brought up to our private balcony when we wished to do so, and even though there's a set menu they can cater to your needs. The housekeeping is very meticulous and the garden and swimming pool are beautiful and well kept. The bathroom facilities are excellent and the personal care products such as shampoo are all nice and fresh lemon grass scented. 
There's a free shuttle ride to the city center of Ubud and back to the villa. Coming back from the hustle and bustle of city life, Korurua is a relaxing place to come back to. When looking for a place to stay, don't hesitate to book Korurua and be welcomed by the most friendly staff in an amazing villa.
title: Excellent and enjoyable stay

Stop searching any further and book your stay at KORURA and I promise, you´ll have the most amazing experience. Me and my mum stayed for 4 nights and we wish we would have stayed even longer. text:
Upon check-in, the manager and two members of the staff warmly greeted us and escorted us to our room where there was a fresh chocolate cake with "happy honeymoon" on it (they even sang to us to wish us a happy honeymoon!) and an outdoor bathtub filled with beautiful rose petals and a romantic message waiting for us! :) They also gave us a detailed explanation of their services menu at Korurua. The staff is so friendly and cheerful and professional and always requested feedback on what they should do better. The only thing I can recommend for improvement is food menu variety, more options would be lovely and it would be very nice to extend the room service dining from 8 pm to 10 pm. All the Food & Beverage we consumed at Korurua was GREAT-tasting and they always delivered our room service in a prompt manner. 

The pool is beautiful and calm and clean and very close to our room. They have stunning views of the jungle. Their housekeeping is easily available, very efficient, and they have the best laundry service I have ever had at any hotel, the scent that they use is just WOW.

They are quick to offer you help so don't hesitate to ask. They want to exceed your expectations, you can tell by their guest interaction :) 

The Villa has a cozy, traditional yet modern vibe, feels very good to just be there. We stayed at three hotels in Bali, and this was the BEST. We will come back again for sure!

Please keep up the good work and don't change (only for the better!) :) 

Best regards,

Shereen & Mohamed
(Mr. and Mrs. Anan)
title: Exceptional Honeymoon Stay thanks to Korurua!

The food was of a surprisingly high standard, with an extensive breakfast menu for our selection every morning. The resort is also perfect for couples hoping for some privacy, as you are given the option to dine in private balcony of your own room. The staff greeted us by name whenever they saw us, and never failed to serve us with a warm  smile. Truly great value and a wonderful experience with Korurua.

text: Firstly the scenery surrounding this villa is breathtakingly stunning!  This hotel adds to that with its luxurious and beautiful villas.  The outside bathroom is a true delight, set in an elegantly enclosed courtyard with the sound of nature buzzing in the background.  There is also a bathroom inside.  Lemongrass scented toiletries are cleverly brimming in ceramic jugs, each labelled and they have delicious smelling bath salts.  Step out of the deep bath into fluffy white towels and the supplied gown and slippers.  The rooms are beautifully decorated, the bed is heaven and the pillows the best for a good nights rest.  The room opens up to either the spotlessly clean infinity pool facing the jungle on the other you lead out to a balcony and that stunning view.  The noises of nature awaken your senses and leave you with a gratitude for nature.  The daybed provided is the perfect place to do that.  Food is served intimately on your balcony which the staff set up beautifully.  The food is truly mouth watering and tasty and always served with a smile.  Free activities every day, they can set up tours.  Panda is an exceptional and knowledgeable guide, we cycled through the rice paddies and all the while he explained his culture, rituals, his family village.  He was lovely as were all the staff.  I loved our stay here reconnecting with nature, it was perfect in every way so I say to all the staff at Korurua thank you so very much from the bottom of my heart.
title: There wasn't anything I did not like about this hotel, it is perfect for any length of stay!

text:
Korurua is simply AMAZING! There are only a few villas at Korurua, so it feels very special and private. The staff is so attentive, considerate, warm welcoming, kind, helpful... It's a very intimate and personal experience, the staff are there whenever you need anything and go out of their way to treat you like a queen/kind. I appreciated their efforts so much. They put an incredible amount of care into their service.
The actual villa was beautiful, I loved the traditional Balinese style and all the little details that made it special. There is so much attention to detail and everything is carefully considered, from the amazing smell of the shower products to the beautiful tiles everywhere. The outdoor bathtub and bamboo shower were just as perfect as the infinity pool overlooking the palm trees and Korurua's private garden. So special at night.
I also fell in love with the massive outdoor day bed - I could have spent all day there, just moving from the pool to the daybed to the outdoor bathtub and all over again. 
If you do want to leave and get into central Ubud, they offer a shuttle service, which they organised for me whenever I wanted one, even outside the regular hours (so nice!). I also learnt how to make jamu and boreh, which was very special, and the welcome drink, similar to jamu, simply tasted amazing.
You'll never want to leave this place again and I wish I could have stayed all my time in Bali here. Thank you!
title: Best place I've ever stayed at

text: I’d say this small boutique hotel is more like home. It has 7 individual suites facing jungle and valley . We were given Koru Classic suite, which was located adjacent to the infinity pool, complete with a beautiful outdoor shower and a perfectly large daybed to unwind our day.  The property located in beautiful village which is close enough to town, yet it is far enough to enjoy the serenity of the surrounding.   It offers a complimentary shuttle service to Ubud downtown at our disposal. The staffs were impeccably warm and would not letting you to do anything. Another feature worth mentioning about is the super comfortable bed and the turndown service the staff did on daily basis at dusk. We enjoyed our morning walk by the paddy field and visited the nearby temple. The food were delicious in taste, creative in presentation and with a reasonable price. All in all, we truly enjoyed our stay in Korurua Ubud Villa...

text:
Was pleasantly surprised by the quality and service provided by Korurua. The food was great (especially loved the salad and chicken with mustard sauce). The room was spacious and the attention to details the villa put, made my short stay, even more rewarding, from the keychain to the hairdryer (no, it's not that cheap dryer that takes forever to dry your hair). 

What even surprised me was that the price was very reasonable. I've stayed in hotels and villas in Ubud that cost at least twice that of Korurua's but lower in service. 

The view is spectacular and the villa provides shuttle services to downtown Ubud. 

Loved my stay at Korurua and will definitely be back!
title: a VERY pleasant surprise

text:
I visited Korurua with my wife based on a friend's reccomendation. this place is well designed with traditional balinese art, with a very cozy and peaceful atmosphere. my wife immediately fell in love with this place. even the staffs are very kind and friendly. this is definitely a good place for a retreat, and honeymoon. or if you just want to plan a short getaway. 
I would definitely visit again.

Highly reccomended!
title: A quiet and peaceful place with nice food and friendly staffs

text: This villa is located in a rather quite place. It offers a giant balcony with a comfortable sofa for one to sit and relax, drink some coffee or work in silence. The food is exquisite, giving an essence of true balinese food and a mixture of western cuisine.
title: The definition of relaxation

text: My families favorite part about our visit to Bali, was our stay at Kororua. Every little detail...from the art and architecture down to the linens and the shampoo... made it  feel like a true escape into the Balinese tropics. The staff was so friendly and went above and beyond to help us experience the part of Ubud that is "off the beaten trail." At the same time, it was close enough to the city center that we could get there in just a few minutes, spend the day exploring, and then get home quickly to enjoy some rest and a quiet, relaxing dinner at the villa. The menu had something for everyone. Even my kids enjoyed the food. I can't say enough about our experience at Kororua. Very professional, but also very personal. It was a special experience. We will be back.
title: Felt like a tropical escape into another world

text: Good location,  it is near  to the center, but  a serene place.  the staff is very friendly and have a good knowledge of the surrounding village. The room is spacious clean, detailed and very well designed. The  quality of soap , lotions , shampoo is beyond our expectation. The quality of food is good.  The design and art works of the villa are  well matched  with the surrounding balinese village. The free shuttle to ubud center is very helpful. Our family also love the foods.
title: Beautiful home

text: I came and stayed at Korurua Ubud for 7 days with my family. It was an awesome experience. I love the place, the art, the ambience, the staff were friendly .. the food were amazing. This is far more than I am looking for. The feeling is home away from home. The massage treat especially unique and cosy. Top notch you guys ... I will be sure to return at the soonest
title: A complete sanctuary for body & soul

text:
We spent two wonderful nights in the Wooden Villa of Korurua Dijiwa.
The great wooden design made us feel right at home.
The complex is beautifully adapted to the green Ubud and is located about 15 minutes outside the centre, so it is nice and quiet.

My partner had a massage at the 1919 Spa on the first day and I had a body scrub the following day. Both treatments were very relaxing. The masseuse is a master of her craft.

The breakfast and dinner at Uma Tiki Restaurant also met all our expectations of original Indonesian cuisine. Thank you also for the very attentive service.

All in all a great stay, we will be back!
title: Lovely green Ubud getaway

text: My husband and I spent a week in the Koru suite and it was such a lovely experience. Beautiful pool next to the suite, shared with 3 other rooms, which receives a nice amount of sun, with dappled shade from the palm trees. We enjoyed breakfast on the spacious balcony each morning, and spent rainy mornings reading on the day bed. The room itself was great, amazingly large and comfy bed, nice bathroom with large tub (some 'nature' gets in, but nothing that bothered us). Loved the main pool with lounges under umbrellas and a chill swim-up bar with long cocktail happy hour. Uma Tiki restaurant served good food, snacks could be ordered poolside. The 1919 spa was simple but lovely with the sweetest staff, great massages - we went 3 times! 30% discount on food at restaurant and spa treatments for hotel guests. All the staff are so so friendly and helpful, was lovely chatting with them in the morning before heading out for the day, and after we'd return. Good free shuttle to and from Ubud town centre, Korurua Dijiwa is a nice 10minute drive away so really peaceful to set up as a base. We loved everything about our stay and hope to come back again soon. Thank you for having us!
title: Loved it!

We stayed here for 8 nights in one of the wooden cabins, pictures don't do them justice, they really are so relaxing and have a very romantic atmosphere! 
The resort is a good distance from town so you can walk in (takes around 30 minutes) but also not too close to all the noise. It's also close to a few small restaurants and massage places (5 minute walk).
Definitely the best complimentary breakfast I've ever had at a resort. The food and drinks here for lunch/dinner were great aswell, but my only criticism is I wish there was a little more variety. 
Would definitely stay here again!

text: We had a wonderful stay at Korurua Dijiwa Ubud. The location is just up the road from the heart of Ubud so while you’re in close proximity to everything, it is a peaceful and relaxing stay. The staff are very helpful and the property has everything you could want. They have two swimming pools, one with a pool bar, a spa (1919 spa) on site restaurant, and a yoga shala. They have a mix of rooms including Javanese joglos and modern rooms. The bed was extremely comfortable and the outdoors bath tub was so beautiful and relaxing. The restaurant, Uma Tiki, was delicious and they breakfast had a large variety to choose from. Definitely would recommend to anyone coming to Ubud!
title: Perfect location, great stay in Ubud!

text: I was totally enchanted with this hotel. The landscaping was artistic but natural, the wood villas are joglo style and precious, open and tasteful. We enjoyed the (mostly) private plunge pool, patio and private outdoor bathtub. We also very much enjoyed the 1919 spa package and Uma Tiki restaurant which was delicious, open till 11pm! The staff as well was very kind, gracious and welcoming and we appreciated the shuttle into town. We were very sad to leave but highly recommend this hidden gem to anyone in Bali!
title: Wooden villa+ pool

text:
Everything about this property is AMAZING! The staff goes above and beyond all expectations to make your stay a dream come true - Sunny, Arta, Ira and Suri were especially helpful during our stay. They made us feel right at home and took care of our every need, while making us feel like family. On top of it all, we had a chance to learn how to make the daily Balinese offerings, canangs, with Ira - definitely don't miss out on this, it was beyond special!
The property itself is an oasis. With multiple pools, fish ponds and gardens, you will find it a struggle to leave every day. We ended up spending most of our time on the grounds because we just couldn't drag ourselves away! 
The Koru suite was unbelievable- privacy, beauty, and a perfect mix of indoor and outdoor space for the bathroom. The private patio attached was a dream - a huge, comfortable day bed and a view of the pool and lush landscaping. 
If you are looking for a retreat that is only a few minutes drive from Ubud central, and still within a few minutes walk of outstanding restaurants, you must stay here! 
We are already planning our return trip!!
title: AMAZING!

text:
We wanted a more private and quiet Hotel in Ubud and found the perfect accommodation with Korurua Dijiwa. Located just outside the city center, it offers peace and relaxation with excellent service, but at the same time you are just a few minutes away from Ubud. The staff is especially friendly and you feel right at home. The whole complex is laid out like a large tropical garden and is very well maintained. The two pools offer refreshment, and there is also a pool bar at the lower one. Breakfast is fresh and delicious and we even got a floating breakfast at the pool! You can choose if you want it in your room or in the restaurant. At the Uma Tiki Restaurant we had one of the best dinners during our stay in Bali.
Highly recommend this Hotel and we definitely will be back!
title: Calm and relaxing accommodation in paradise

text: We had an amazing time and a lot of it was due to the kind, welcoming and accommodating people who work at Korurua Dijiwa Ubud and make it such a special place to be. We very much appreciated their care and helpful attitudes. Our villa is  very comfortable, rustic, well maintained and quaint and still fit right in with rest of this beautiful resort. Uma Tiki Restaurant is pretty artsy with all those artworks around and the food was delicious, pretty fresh best described as simple cooking done well. The setting of this resort was isolated enough to feel remote, but just a short drive away from Ubud town.  Highly recommend it to anyone who can appreciate how unique this place really is.

text: Me and my husband stayed there for two nights, we wanted to make our wedding anniversary special. We stayed in Koru suite and we absolutely loved our room. It had a terrace, bedroom area, bathroom with outside bath. We loved the design and style of the interior. Water refill is free during whole day. We were also nicely surprised with breakfast menu and selection they offer - it was the widest selection of food and drinks (also fancy coffees like cappuccino or latte) we could choose in a breakfast offer in Bali. They also offer afternoon tea which consists of tea or coffee and a small snack. They made our stay very special and prepared nice welcome surprise for us. We will definitely be back.
title: Hidden paradise in Ubud.

text:
I very liked the personal, very polite and welcoming at all times. Villa itself is very cozy and designed in close-to-nature style which is impressing a lot. 
Rooms are big and very beatiful, you have your own terrace where you can enjoy your breakfast/lunch/dinner. 
The food mostly is good and prices in hotel's restaurant comparing to Nusa Dua where we have been before are quite okey.
The management of the hotel was very kind and allowed us to check out later due to our late flight.
You can take bicycles for free and explore surrounding area.

 In the place where I hoped to find tranquility I really didn't manage to find it at all times, only in the evening when the construction works opposite to villa were stopped (I feel so sorry about this, because it's not your fault), when no more scooters rode across the street (Would be nice to be able to close windows in the bathroom in the rooms which lead to the road) and when neighbours in the room adjacent to our didn't make any noise anymore (Good audibility).
Food is good, but breakfast, in my opinion, lacks some sandwiches with ham/cheese as sometimes there were too much of fruits and our stomach didn't behave good at all because of big content of them. As for another dishes there were too much of different types of onion. Once we ate soup where we found 3-4 types of onion and therefore taste was only of onion. I understood that onion is important component of Indonesian cousine, but there should be some limit for using it because sometimes it really makes the dishes to taste poor. 
Bicycles were maintained very poorly as mine had problems with the seat/gears/clutch but bicycle of my wife had problems with gears/broken pedal. This kind of bicycles could be dangerous to ride.
title: Wish you improve what is possible to improve.

text:
I loved my stay at Korurua Villa! The villa is beautiful and small (although rooms are huge) and staff are so kind and caring. The included activities (especially the morning walk through the rice paddies and to a nearby temples) were the highlights for me and make this great value for money - book direct for the best deal. The pool and surrounding area are stunning. So lovely to swim at dusk as night falls under the palm trees surrounding the pool. The villas offers a range of day trips and tours but guests are never under any pressure to book - service is warm, friendly and discrete. 

Room
My room was huge and very stylishly furnished and decorated. Fresh flowers and complimentary fruit were in the room along with bottled water, a fridge, bathrobe, slippers and other extras. Essential oils were burned in the bathroom - divine. Bed was comfy and linen was of the highest quality. Staff made up the room twice a day - what a treat! There are small windows that are permanently open at the very top of the bathroom - these keep the room smelling fresh and feeling airy but also allow a little noise from outside and occasional insects to enter. My tip is to keep the bathroom door closed in the evenings with the bathroom lights off and you will be fine. Totally loved the day bed outside my room and being served breakfast and dinner on the balcony overlooking the pool below. 

Location
The Villa is about 3km north east of the centre of town (using Ubud Palace as a reference), so about a 30-40min walk. They offer a two-way free shuttle to/from the Palace every 2 hours starting mid-morning and ending with a pick up at 8pm. You need to call about an hour before you would like a pick up (phone provided). At other times, the hotel can arrange transport for 70K. The Villa has bicycles for guests to use for free for getting around locally - BYO helmet. Staying in town is convenient for yoga and the museums and cafes, but it is also great to stay somewhere quiet and tranquil like Junjungan where the Villa is located - with Ubud town centre being a short ride away. 

Proximity to restaurants
One thing that initially put me off staying at this hotel was distance from other restaurants, so I booked half board (with dinner included each night - the Villa selects the meal of the day) as I was travelling solo and didn't want to worry about getting taxis every night. However there is a charming little restaurant called "Ithaka Warung Ubud" very very close by (a few minutes walk) and another bar and restaurant with a mix of Indonesian and Western dishes a little further away (north) that looked very cheerful. Ithaka offers a range of great sounding dishes at very reasonable prices, and is popular as it is currently #10 T/A. However the food at Korurua Villa was very nice so I have no regrets (mains are about 50-70K). There is plenty of choice at the Villa restaurant and prices are very reasonable - no resort inflation here!

Thank you to all the wonderful staff at Korurua for making my stay so magical and memorable. I can't wait to return!
title: Tranquil paradise among the paddies

text:
Two days before arriving at korurua, my fiance and I got engaged. Coming to the korurua Villas couldnt have come with better timing as this is a very special time for us and I can honestly say these villas are intimate luxury villas with a magical ambiance and we both agree we feel so special and pampered being here.
 
The rooms are beautifully designed and finished. Furnished with a comfortable superking size bed and the best pillows I've ever felt in a hotel. Also the bed linen are of the highest quality. The rooms smell fresh of zesty lemongrass. The bathroom is huge and a relaxing soak in the large bath tub just melt stresses away, we love the smell and quality of the showergel,shampoo and conditioners provided.  Dressing gowns and slippers provided in the cupboard plus they provide a good quality hairdryer and a large underalla and we noticed a travel adaptor on the bedside table. These little touches make all the difference to make sure all your bases are covered. Good aircon and flat screen tv with satellite.  I have to mention they provided free fruit and mineral water, plus a mini bar with ice cold drinks(non alcohicc that are actually reasonable prices.  

The service prodided is second to none. You can opt to have your meals in your room or in the reception dinning area. We opted to have all of our meals on our private terrace. There is nothing better waking up and being served breakfast with your new finance in the middle of the jungle. We had fresh watermelon juice, orange juice, coffee, hot chocolate, pastries and then an omelette. Everyday you can choose from a few difference selections they put togther and tell them what time you would like to be served in the morning.

The villas are brand new and only opened in February, so we were a little weary as it only had 25 reviews. In fact this benefited us as I think they are under priced for what you actually get. My advice is to snap it up and go for it. It's just simply beautiful, perfect for a honey moon or if you want the luxuraly sanctuary feel. 

 There is a free shuttlle to and from ubud witch takes 10-15 minutes. Cabs in BALI are super cheap and to ubud would cost around £2. We came here from nusa dua (2 hours away) to bring us here we hired a man for £35 for the whole day and did every tourist thing there is to do in ubud. Bali swing , rice Padi, the waterfall and monkey sanctuary... all very close to Korurua. We wanted to it all in one day so we could enjoy the hotel the rest of the time we are in ubud (3days). I wish we'd booked for longer. Massages, relaxation, gorgeous infinity pool and stunning views into the jungle.

Big thank you Korurua villas you've made our time in ubud very special.
title: The best hotel I've ever stayed at. Luxury intimate boutique hotel Consisting of 7 villas

text: In una sola parola: meraviglioso. Abbiamo passato 4 notti in questa struttura e ringraziamo tutto lo staff per la calorosa accoglienza e per l'ottima professionalità. La struttura è immersa nel verde vicina alle risaie in una zona molto tranquilla dove si sentono cantare gli uccellini e gracidare le rane in tarda sera. La stanza è grande ed ha uno dei bagni più grandi che abbiamo mai visto. Pulita e dotata di tutti i comfort. Oltre che sapientemente arredata in stile tradizionale. Il servizio di pulizia della stanza è effettuato due volte al giorno. All'interno della struttura vi sono due piscine di cui una con il pool bar e una spa (consigliato il massaggio balinese che abbiamo provato! ). Vi è anche la possibilità di effettuare una cooking class nel bellissimo giardino della struttura. Ci è stato offerto anche un servizio fotografico che abbiamo effettuato con la simpatica Sutri. Per la colazione il giorno prima si compila un modulo con i piatti che si intendono consumare e si può scegliere se effettuarla al ristorante oppure direttamente in camera. Buonissima colazione espressa.
title: Meraviglioso hotel

text: Bei der Ankunft im Korurua wird man mit einem persönlichen Brief begrüßt - "welcome to our sanctuary", und es stimmt. Das Personal ist zauberhaft und wahrscheinlich das netteste Team, das ich je in einem Hotel erlebt habe (danke, Sunny! :) ). Zu meinem Geburtstag hat mich das Team beim Traumfrühstück auf meiner Terrasse mit Blumen und Kuchen überrascht. Unbedingt auch das Restaurant ausprobieren, das Essen ist köstlich und vor allem die Ingwer-Kürbissuppe der Knaller. Die Cocktails definitiv durchprobieren, super lecker. 100% empfehlenswert, macht weiter so, liebes Team!

text:
Face à l'hôtel et plus spécialement face aux Suites Koru, il y a un chantier de construction de la 3ème phase de développement de l'hôtel, comme cela nous a été confirmé par la direction. Ce chantier a commencé il y a 1 mois. Or, aucune communication à ce sujet par la direction, excepté un mail 1h avant notre arrivée ! La vue sur la végétation n'existe plus, tout à été rasé. Bruits incessants de bétonnières, d'ouvriers qui crient, de coups de masse, etc... Du matin 7h30 au soir 19h, voire même la dernière nuit jusqu'à minuit !!! Impossible de déjeuner ou dîner sur la terrasse de la Suite, ni de profiter de la piscine et de ses transats. Petit déjeuner à prendre impérativement avant 8h pour espérer échapper au vacarme des bétonnières. Le personnel fait tout ce qu'il peut pour compenser ce désagrément et est d'une gentillesse incroyable. Cependant, cela ne suffit pas. La direction a décliné notre demande d'explications en face-face et nous a "royalement" fait un discount de 20% sur la restauration et 1 jour de scooter, soit 16€ au total... Quel bel effort... D'autres clients ont carrément quitté l'hôtel, ce que nous n'avons malheureusement pas pu faire en raison de notre programme. Aucune considération pour le client de la part de la direction, qui a délibérément ignoré notre dernier mail. Livraison des nouveaux bâtiments mi-2020...les clients doivent être informés ! Nous avions choisi cet hôtel pour sa situation hors de la bruyante Ubud pour nous reposer, c'est raté ! 2 nuits sans sommeil...

C'est vraiment dommage car le personnel est aux petits soins, la suite Koru est spacieuse et confortable, grand choix de petits déjeuner et restaurant goûteux.
title: Hôtel actuellement en travaux : nuisances sonores et visuelles !

owner_response.text:
Cher M. / s Elsante. Om swastiastu ... Salutations chaleureuses de Korurua Ubud "Un endroit pour récupérer vos sens" Merci beaucoup pour votre commentaire et votre séjour à Korurua Ubud. Toutes vos critiques, nous allons faire pour motiver notre service de mieux en mieux dans futur.

Cependant, nous voudrions toujours clarifier le problème de contraction que nous vous avions annoncé avant votre séjour si nous avons un problème de contraction qui ne nous appartient pas et que nous ne pouvons pas contrôler beaucoup pour cela.
En raison de la responsabilité de nos clients, nous leur offrons un peu de tranquillité, un scooter gratuit, un massage et une boisson, et nous offrons également une annulation gratuite si notre invité est inconfortable, alors restez chez nous, quelle que soit la date de votre départ, vous avez besoin d'un obtenir plus de mécontentement que nous avions convenu notre conpesation ci-dessus, donc ce n'est pas manière élégante pour nous.

Nous espérons que vous pourrez partager votre meilleure expérience avec Korurua ubud à vos amis et à d’autres. Nous sommes heureux de vous accueillir pour votre prochaine visite à Korurua Ubud. à bientôt pour notre prochaine visite à notre villa «Korurua Ubud», Cordialement, Panca Susila
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Ужасные впечатления от отеля, рейтинг которого на booking целых 9,6, цена 250 $ за ночь.
На фото в booking это шикарный отель с прекрасным пейзажем на джунгли и инфинити-бассейном.
Однако мы попали в такой период, что вместо джунглей за бассейном была стройка какого-то отеля и непрерывный шум строителей, а чтобы гости этого не видели, край бассейна полностью оградили бамбуком.
Естественно, во время бронирования мы видели шикарные фото и об этом крайне неприятном факторе ничего не было сказано со стороны отеля, и цена не была снижена ни на рупий.
На вопрос работникам отеля «почему вид различается», они делают вид что не понимают вопрос и вообще не знают английский.
Кстати, персонал отеля, в частности работник ресепшена, очень плохо знает английский, на уровне новичка, что так же не допустимо для отеля с таким именем, да и вообще для гостиничного бизнеса.
Когда мы сказали, что не собираемся тут оставаться за такие деньги, они ещё посмели принести нам чек на отмену бронирования, в котором сказано, что мы должны в этом случае оплатить 50 % полной стоимости!
Естественно, мы ничего не стали платить, были жутко возмущены и расстроены, и в итоге потеряли 2 часа на поиск нового отеля 😩☹️.
Очень разочарованы персоналом и видом этого отеля, повторюсь, с рейтингом 9,6!!!
title: Неожиданный «сюрприз» от Korurua

text:
这个别墅是这次巴厘岛之旅个人最喜欢的酒店，出门在外，鞍马劳顿，这个酒店可以让我放松身心，找到家的感觉。酒店外表看起来并不起眼，是一家宅院改建而来，闯堂而入别有洞天。此地环境清新悠然，有一个可爱的小泳池，后又有茂林修竹，十分幽静。躺在阳台沙发上午睡，听着蝉鸣，吹着微风，甚是惬意。

酒店工作人员服务热情好客，会主动询问有什么需要帮助，并在提出要求后积极联系安排。比如帮忙租助动车等。房间内的家具和陈设有当地特色又极具美感，仿佛件件艺术珍品，在朴素的表象下蕴藏着丰富的文化内涵。

早餐也是极为丰富，酒店员工会在前晚询问选择，并在指定的时间送到阳台，早起后便可享用，味道很赞。

在此处，整个旅途的速度慢了下来，让人倍感舒适。

I would say staying at the Korurua Villa gives me the feeling just like staying at home, which for me is the one of the best comments I can give to a hotel. 

The environment is wonderful, and words fail me. Located in the village I guess, it’s quiet and peaceful. The architecture is unique with local culture flavor, with beautiful enchanted interior design and furniture. 

The people here is very warm and responsive. They always show great hospitality with smile, which makes me more eager to reach out to them. They can do their best to meet my request such as help arrange motor bike renting and provide us with the traditional herb drink made from tamarind, a local plant with unique scent and flavor. 

Though not so close to the Main Street it Ubud, it is not difficult for me to get their from the villa, either through motor bike or taxi. The villa also has shuttle bus each 2 hours to go to the Ubud center.

The food in the villa is also splendid. Unlike the traditional breakfast, the villa can provide some more featuring food. Also, it is possible to have the breakfast in the balcony, enjoying the beautiful scene of the pool and the garden, which are neat and lovely.

All in all, I find the experience in the villa very unforgettable and I can still remember lying on the couch taking a nap at noon with, feeling the breeze with floral scent, which is the feeling at home exactly.
title: Feeling At Home

text:
Nous avons séjourné 6 nuits dans cet hôtel qui est tout simplement magnifique! Le personnel est aux petits soins, la piscine est superbe et en plus il y a possibilité de se faire faire un massage sur la terrasse de la chambre.
Nous avons eu la chance d'être surclassé car nous restions longtemps et nous avons donc profité de la douche et de la baignoire en plein air. Un rêve tout simplement!
Le service de navette gratuite pour aller jusqu'en ville est très bien organisé et les différentes activités proposées par L'hôtel, notamment la ballade dans les rizières et la conception d'offrandes sont super!
Un endroit que je recommande sans hésiter!

text:
Es war einfach nur wunderbar. Wir konnten während unserem leider sehr kurzen Aufenthalt (2 Nächte) nicht einen einzigen Mangel feststellen, ganz im Gegenteil.
Wir hatten die Koru Suite gebucht mit dem All Inklusive Paket und es war herrlich. Vom Frühstück, über Mittagessen, Tee und Abendessen wurden wir rundum verwöhnt. Ob auf der oberen Terrasse oder direkt am Zimmer eingenommen, war es jedes Mal entspannt und lecker. 
Die Mitarbeiter und Mitarbeiterinnen waren allesamt sehr um unser Wohlbefinden bemüht und haben uns jeden Wunsch erfüllt. Nicht nur dass, sondern an unserem Hochzeitstag wurden wir sogar noch mit einem Kuchen überrascht. 
Auch durch die geringe Zimmeranzahl und die etwas abgelegene Lage, wird der Aufenthalt hier zu einem Highlight.
In den ganzen Räumen duftet es wunderbar leicht nach Blumen und die Außenbadewanne, hinter dem geräumigen Bad, das Bali-Sofa draußen. 
Die komplette Ausstattung, der familiäre Flair und die Detailverliebtheit sind einfach Klasse! 
Das erste Mal, dass ich etwas gebucht habe und die Bilder die Wirklichkeit wiedergegeben haben! 
Wir haben den Aufenthalt sehr genossen und werden, sollte sich die Gelegenheit ergeben, auf jeden Fall nochmals Zeit dort verbringen.
title: Eine Oase der Sinne am Rande des Urwaldes
